categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Richard Glover is an actor and writer who is known for his work in the movies Into the Woods and The Casual Vacancy.

Glover's career began in London, where he performed live comedy sketches. In 2002, he began to act, beginning with the movie Santa Smokes. Later, Glover was hired to play Red Twelve in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
Richard Glover at the Internet Movie Database
